text.0: agni show favour great art thou who to this pious man art come.
text.1: to seat thee on the sacred grass.
text.2: may he the immortal helper bard to be deceived among mankind.
text.4: around the altar is he led welcome chief priest at solemn rites.
text.5: or as the potar sits him down.
text.6: agni in fire at sacrifice and in the house as lord thereof.
text.7: and as a brahman takes his seat.
text.8: thou comest as the guide of folk who celebrate a sacrifice.
text.9: and to oblations brought by men.
text.10: thou servest as his messenger whose sacrifice thou lovest well.
text.11: to bear the mortals gifts to heaven.
text.12: accept our solemn rite be pleased aṅgiras with our sacrifice.
text.13: give ear and listen to our call.
text.14: may thine inviolable car wherewith thou guardest those who give.
text.15: come near to us from every side.
